main event: An object was observed in London, described as a watermelon-shaped white light, estimated to be 1,000 feet high, moving slowly and maneuvering up and down.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5 minutes,The sighting occurred on 16 Aug 52 at 11:12 PM,There was no air traffic at the time of the sighting,The object emitted bright lights as it approached the observer's location,No reliable information about the observers' credibility was available.
witness description: The observer noted a slow-moving object with very characteristic guided movements.
